Title: Bangladesh’s RPGCL seeks one September LNG cargo
Description: Bangladesh’s state-owned gas firm Rupantarita Prakritik Gas Co. Ltd. has issued a tender to buy one LNG cargo for delivery to Moheskhali on Sep. 11-12. The tender closes on Jul. 30, with offers expected to remain valid until Aug. 3.
Author: CK

Title: Petronas, Pertamina acquire Shell’s stake in Indonesia’s Masela gas block
Description: Malaysia’s state-owned Petronas and Indonesia’s Pertamina Hulu Energi have jointly acquired Shell’s 35% stake in the production sharing contract of the Masela gas block in east Indonesia, for about $650 million, with the move seen advancing the long-delayed Abadi LNG project.
Author: CK

Title: Pakistan secures one-year LNG supply from Azerbaijan’s Socar Trading
Description: State-owned Pakistan LNG has signed a framework agreement with the marketing and trading unit of the State Oil Company of the Republic of Azerbaijan, or Socar Trading, to secure the supply of LNG for one year, with this expected to contribute towards alleviating Pakistan’s severe gas shortages.
Author: CK
